howItWorks.question: How does the booking work?
howItWorks.answer: Simply enter your postal code, select a workshop and book an appointment online. You will receive immediate confirmation via email.

fixedPrices.question: Are the prices binding?
fixedPrices.answer: Yes, all displayed prices are fixed prices. There are no hidden costs.

cancellation.question: Can I cancel my appointment?
cancellation.answer: Yes, you can cancel free of charge up to 24 hours before the appointment. For short-notice cancellations, our cancellation terms apply.

payment.question: How do I pay?
payment.answer: You can pay conveniently online by credit card or PayPal. Payment is made after completion of the work.

footer.tagline: The easiest way to book workshop appointments.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions here.

items.question: How does the fixed price work?
items.answer: Our fixed price system guarantees you transparent costs. After entering your vehicle and desired service, you'll immediately receive a binding final price – no hidden fees or surprises.

items.question: What services do you offer?
items.answer: We offer a wide range of maintenance services: oil changes, inspections, brake service, AC service, tire changes, and much more. All services are performed by certified partner workshops.

items.question: How does the pickup and delivery service work?
items.answer: One of our trained drivers picks up your vehicle at the agreed time, takes it to the workshop, and delivers it back to you after completion. The service is included in all our packages.

items.question: What payment methods are accepted?
items.answer: You can conveniently pay by credit card, PayPal, or SEPA direct debit. Payment is processed securely through our encrypted platform.

items.question: Can I cancel my booking?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your booking free of charge up to 24 hours before the scheduled appointment. For shorter-notice cancellations, processing fees may apply.

items.question: Are your workshops certified?
items.answer: Absolutely. All our partner workshops go through a rigorous quality process and are certified by independent bodies. We only work with the best workshops.

lovableFooter.tagline: Premium vehicle maintenance with fixed price guarantee and concierge service.
